mapper.select: select from items where id=#{itemId} for update
mapper.insert: insert into items (name, price, description, details, images,shop_id, status,add_time) values (#{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{details}, #{images}, 1, 1, now())
mapper.update: update items set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, details = #{details}, images = #{images}, price = #{price}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
